DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect telaprevir boceprevir pharmacokinetics maraviroc .
DOC.brief_title: Estimate Effect Telaprevir Boceprevir Maraviroc Pharmacokinetics Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 . Total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day . Positive result HIV1 , HIV2 , Hepatitis B serology ( HbsAg , HbcAb ) anti hepatitis C virus serology ( determine multi antigen EIA ) .
